segments.text: I'm really scared watching this; the boy's stool is about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high into the cookie jar, all stretched out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble right onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's close by, she might get hurt too if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is spreading fast across the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea, still focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's submerged, and she could slip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad thinking of the accident about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks safe and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, hazards everywhere with the overflow and the climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before someone gets injured.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies aren't worth the risk they're taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
